TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecAccessible extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration whose values specify when a keychain item should be readable.

remarks.para: There are a number of axis to consider for the accessible settings of an item.
Whether the information should be made accessible without entering a passcode, the device being unlocked or always available.
Another one is whether the information should be locked to this device, or whether the information can migrate to a new device via a backup restore.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Security.SecAccessible AfterFirstUnlock = int32(1)

summary.para: The data is only available after the first time the device has been unlocked after booting.
Recommended use: when the data is required in the background.
Migration: When using encrypted backups, the data will be copied to a new device.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Security.SecAccessible AfterFirstUnlockThisDeviceOnly = int32(4)

summary.para: The data is only available after the first time the device has been unlocked after booting.
Recommended use: when the data is required in the background.
Migration: The data will not move to a new device after a backup restore.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Security.SecAccessible Always = int32(2)

summary.para: Migration: When using encrypted backups, the data will be copied to a new device.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Security.SecAccessible AlwaysThisDeviceOnly = int32(5)

summary.para: Migration: The data will not move to a new device after a backup restore.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Security.SecAccessible Invalid = int32(-1)
.field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Security.SecAccessible WhenPasscodeSetThisDeviceOnly = int32(6)

summary.para: Limits access to the item to both this device and requires a passcode to be set and the data is only available if the device is currently unlocked.
If the user removes the passcode on the device, these items are automatically removed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Security.SecAccessible WhenUnlocked = int32(0)

summary.para: The data is only available when the device is unlocked.
Recommended use: when the data is only required when the application is in the foreground.
Migration: When using encrypted backups, the data will be copied to a new device.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.Security.SecAccessible WhenUnlockedThisDeviceOnly = int32(3)

summary.para: Limits access to the item to this device and the device being unlocked.
Migration: The data will not move to a new device after a backup restore.
